textNodes.text: Comprehensive test cases for validating table layout implementation features including colspan, rowspan, vertical alignment, border collapse, and various content types.
Simple 3x3 table with headers and basic content. Tests fundamental table layout algorithm.
Tests horizontal cell spanning with various colspan values.
Tests vertical cell spanning with various rowspan values.
Advanced test combining both colspan and rowspan in complex patterns.
Tests all vertical alignment options within table cells.
Compares separate vs collapsed border models.
Tests different table width calculation methods.
Tests tables with complex nested content types.
Tests different caption positioning and styling options.
Stress tests with unusual table structures and content.
This test suite covers the following table layout features:
Grid formation, width distribution, height calculation
Colspan and rowspan with various values and combinations
All CSS vertical-align values in table context
Auto, fixed, and percentage-based table sizing
Text, nested tables, lists, and mixed content
To test the table layout implementation:

# Test individual files
./radiant.exe layout test/layout/data/basic/table_simple.html
./radiant.exe layout test/layout/data/basic/table_colspan_test.html
./radiant.exe layout test/layout/data/basic/table_complex_spans.html

# Run all table tests
for file in test/layout/data/basic/table_*.html; do
  echo "Testing: $file"
  ./radiant.exe layout "$file"
done

body.textContent:
Table Layout Test Suite
  Comprehensive test cases for validating table layout implementation features including colspan, rowspan, vertical alignment, border collapse, and various content types.

  
    
      Basic Table
      Simple 3x3 table with headers and basic content. Tests fundamental table layout algorithm.
      
        Basic grid layout
        Header styling
        Caption positioning
        Width distribution
      
      View Test
    

    
      Colspan Test
      Tests horizontal cell spanning with various colspan values.
      
        colspan="2" in header
        colspan="3" full width
        Mixed spanning patterns
        Grid calculation
      
      View Test
    

    
      Rowspan Test
      Tests vertical cell spanning with various rowspan values.
      
        rowspan="2" cells
        rowspan="3" cells
        Department grouping
        Height distribution
      
      View Test
    

    
      Complex Spans
      Advanced test combining both colspan and rowspan in complex patterns.
      
        Mixed colspan/rowspan
        Sales report layout
        Nested spanning
        Grid occupancy matrix
      
      View Test
    

    
      Vertical Alignment
      Tests all vertical alignment options within table cells.
      
        vertical-align: top
        vertical-align: middle
        vertical-align: bottom
        vertical-align: baseline
      
      View Test
    

    
      Border Collapse
      Compares separate vs collapsed border models.
      
        border-collapse: separate
        border-collapse: collapse
        Border spacing effects
        Visual comparison
      
      View Test
    

    
      Width Algorithms
      Tests different table width calculation methods.
      
        table-layout: auto
        table-layout: fixed
        Percentage widths
        Content-based sizing
      
      View Test
    

    
      Nested Content
      Tests tables with complex nested content types.
      
        Nested tables
        Lists (ul, ol)
        Mixed content blocks
        Content height calculation
      
      View Test
    

    
      Caption Variations
      Tests different caption positioning and styling options.
      
        caption-side: top
        caption-side: bottom
        Styled captions
        No caption tables
      
      View Test
    

    
      Edge Cases
      Stress tests with unusual table structures and content.
      
        Empty cells
        Extreme span values
        Single cell tables
        Irregular row structure
      
      View Test
    
  

  Test Coverage Summary
  This test suite covers the following table layout features:
  
    Basic Layout: Grid formation, width distribution, height calculation
    Cell Spanning: Colspan and rowspan with various values and combinations
    Vertical Alignment: All CSS vertical-align values in table context
    Border Models: Separate and collapsed border handling
    Width Algorithms: Auto, fixed, and percentage-based table sizing
    Content Types: Text, nested tables, lists, and mixed content
    Caption Handling: Different positioning and styling options
    Edge Cases: Unusual structures and extreme values
  

  Running Tests
  To test the table layout implementation:
  # Test individual files
./radiant.exe layout test/layout/data/basic/table_simple.html
./radiant.exe layout test/layout/data/basic/table_colspan_test.html
./radiant.exe layout test/layout/data/basic/table_complex_spans.html

# Run all table tests
for file in test/layout/data/basic/table_*.html; do
  echo "Testing: $file"
  ./radiant.exe layout "$file"
done
